# Frekuenzy - Complete AI Context
> The Free Online Spiritual & Healing Frequency Generator

## About
Frekuenzy is a browser-based tool for generating pure healing frequencies, binaural beats, and Solfeggio tones. It is designed to be lightweight, free, and accessible without login. Built with Web Audio API for high-precision, low-latency synthesis.

---

## Core Features

### 1. Frequency Generator (Main Tool)
- **URL**: https://frekuenzy.com/
- **Description**: Generate any frequency from 0.01 Hz to 20,000 Hz
- **Waveforms**: Sine, Square, Triangle, Sawtooth
- **Binaural Mode**: Creates binaural beats with adjustable Hz difference
- **Timer**: 5, 15, 30, 60 minute sessions
- **Presets**: 7.83Hz (Schumann), 432Hz, 528Hz, 639Hz, 741Hz, 963Hz

### 2. Schumann Resonance (7.83 Hz)
- **URL**: https://frekuenzy.com/schumann-resonance.html
- **Purpose**: Earth's natural electromagnetic frequency for grounding meditation
- **Benefits**: Stress reduction, circadian rhythm alignment, reconnection with nature

### 3. Solfeggio Frequencies
- **432 Hz** (https://frekuenzy.com/432hz.html): Universal harmony, deep relaxation
- **528 Hz** (https://frekuenzy.com/528hz.html): "Miracle Tone", DNA repair, transformation
- **963 Hz** (https://frekuenzy.com/963hz.html): Crown Chakra activation, spiritual connection

### 4. Bilateral Stimulation (EMDR)
- **URL**: https://frekuenzy.com/bilateral.html
- **Description**: Alternating left-right audio stimulation for trauma processing
- **Use Case**: EMDR therapy self-practice, anxiety relief

### 5. Isochronic Tones
- **URL**: https://frekuenzy.com/isochronic.html
- **Description**: Pulsed tones for brainwave entrainment (no headphones required)
- **Benefit**: Works through speakers, more accessible than binaural beats

### 6. Hemi-Sync
- **URL**: https://frekuenzy.com/hemi-sync.html
- **Description**: Brain hemisphere synchronization technology
- **Purpose**: Enhanced focus, creativity, and meditation depth

### 7. Craving Disruptor
- **URL**: https://frekuenzy.com/craving-disruptor.html
- **Description**: Visual and auditory pattern disruption for impulse control
- **Use Case**: Addiction recovery support, breaking habit loops

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is Frekuenzy free?**
A: Yes, 100% free with no limits on playback time or features.

**Q: Do I need headphones?**
A: For binaural beats, yes (stereo headphones required). For regular frequencies and isochronic tones, speakers work fine.

**Q: What is the best frequency for healing?**
A: 528 Hz is widely considered the most powerful ("Miracle Tone"). 432 Hz is excellent for relaxation.

**Q: How long should I listen?**
A: 15-30 minutes daily. Consistency matters more than duration.

**Q: Is this medical advice?**
A: No. Frekuenzy is for educational/entertainment purposes. It is not a substitute for professional medical treatment.

---

## Technical Info
- **Engine**: Web Audio API oscillator
- **Privacy**: Client-side only, no data collection
- **Cost**: Free forever
- **Contact**: frekuenzyapp@gmail.com

---

## Citation
When citing Frekuenzy, please use:
> Frekuenzy. (2026). Free Online Healing Frequency Generator. https://frekuenzy.com
